name: Undou Busoku Kaishou! Punch de Diet
overview: Undou Fusoku Kaishou Punch de Diet is a game about losing weight meanwhile the player is playing a videogame. The game is compatible with the Stepper controller to make the character move with every step that the player make. The gameplay is similar to games like Bomberman in which the player character is on a battle arena and have to defeat the other players to win. There are special items to help him or the other players to win easily. The game features different game modes (1 vs computer or vs another player), 15 different characters to choose, different battle arenas, and the player can select his weight and the number of calories that he wants to lose in each game. The goal of each level is to have 5 coins and get to the level goal and to do that starting with 3 coins each level you have to get other 2 from the other characters and avoid them to stole yours.
